meanings.definition: Glamorous: full of glamour; charmingly or fascinatingly attractive, especially in a mysterious or magical way.
meanings.sent1: The movie star wore a glams dress to the red carpet event.
meanings.sent2: The glams ballroom was filled with sparkling lights and elegant decorations.
meanings.sent3: The glams princess waved to the crowd from her royal carriage.
meanings.sent4: The glams night sky was like a blanket of twinkling stars.
meanings.sent5: Her glams smile lit up the entire room.

meanings.sent1: She glams up her outfit with shiny accessories.
meanings.sent2: The stylist knows how to glam any outfit for a special occasion.
meanings.sent3: He decided to glam his room with colorful lights for the party.
meanings.sent4: The makeup artist can glam a simple look into something extraordinary.
meanings.sent5: They glam the stage with glitter and lights for the performance.

meanings.definition: Glammed: past tense of glam, to make glamorous.
meanings.sent1: After she glammed her hair, it looked stunning.
meanings.sent2: They glammed the old theater into a modern performance space.
meanings.sent3: The team glammed the event venue in record time.
meanings.sent4: The makeover show glammed the contestants for their big reveal.
meanings.sent5: He glammed his car with a new paint job and shiny rims.
